name: Doodle Pool
description:
Play 8 ball US, 9 ball US and 8 ball UK rules, one player, two player, Time Trial (against the clock) and Shot in the Dark modes all drawn by a doodle, it's fun, casual and seriously addictive! Already a major hit Doodle Pool is destined to be a future classic, quick bite sized gaming but maddingly addictive enough to keep you at it for hours.

Game design, code, art, sound and concept © 2011 Big Head Games Ltd. All rights reserved.
